name: udel_precip_v501_mean
title: Precipitation (Yearly Average) - UDel
description: Average monthly precipitation per year. Created using UDel Precipitation dataset (v5.01)

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Willmott, C. J. and K. Matsuura (2001) Terrestrial Air Temperature and Precipitation: Monthly and Annual Time Series (1950 - 1999), http://climate.geog.udel.edu/~climate/html_pages/README.ghcn_ts2.html.
